isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9200, 9300, 9400 Models Built After January 1, 1995 - ELECTRICAL TROUBLESHOOTING SLEEPER LIGHTING AND ACCESSORIES - OPERATION - Storage Area Light W/60 Inch Cantilever Sleeper

svcproc.title: Storage Area Light W/60 Inch Cantilever Sleeper
svcproc.para: When the Master ON/OFF Switch of the sleeper is in the position (closed), power flows from B1 battery stud through circuits 14K, 14R, fusible link (2 - Blue 12GA), and circuit 14S to energize the sleeper magnetic switch. The ground path from the magnetic switch is circuit 11V, master ON/OFF switch, and circuit 11W to sleeper box ground stud.

With the sleeper magnetic switch energized, and the Storage Area Light switched ON, power flows from the magnetic switch through circuit 14T, fuse N3, and circuit 63AE to the Storage Area Light. The ground path is circuit 11H, and 11M to the Sleeper Blower Motor case ground stud.
